questions.question: What is addEventListener
questions.answer: The method you use to listen for events on an element

questions.question: What is a callback
questions.answer: A function that is executed when an event occurs

questions.question: What is `e.preventDefault()`
questions.answer: The method to prevent the default action of an event

questions.question: What is event delegation
questions.answer: Instead of assigning a handler to each element - we put a single handler on a common parent

questions.question: What is document.querySelector
questions.answer: How we grab elements from the DOM

questions.question: What is document.querySelctorAll
questions.answer: How we grab multiple elements from the DOM

questions.question: What is a string
questions.answer: The datatype that holds strings encapsulated in quotes

questions.question: What is a number
questions.answer: that datatype that holds numbers, without quotes

questions.question: What is an array
questions.answer: a datatype that can hold multiple items in a list
